pipeline

Class APipe<S,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pipeline.APipe<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - source type
    T - target type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPipe<S,T>, ISink<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BayesTrainPipe, CastPipe, ClassificationTestingPipe, FilterPreprocessor, LabelPreprocessor, MongoLoadingPipe, NERStringPreprocessor, PerformanceTestingPipe, RelationCollector, RelationPrefixPostprocessor, RelationTrainPipe, StopwordPreprocessor, TrainingDataPipe, URIFinderPipe, WindowPreprocessor

    public abstract class APipe<S,T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPipe<S,T>
    An abstract implementation for IPipe. Only the push method has to be implemented.
